data.title: Embattled rebel : Jefferson Davis as commander in chief /
data.meta_description: Explores Jefferson Davis's leadership as commander in chief of the Confederacy while discussing such topics as his military prowess and effective partnership with Robert E. Lee.
data.text:
APA Citation (style guide)

McPherson, J. M., & Fass, R. (2014). Embattled rebel: Jefferson Davis as commander in chief. Unabridged. New York : Prince Frederick, MD, Penguin Audio.
